tag.name: form

attribute.description: Indicates the action of submission
attribute.name: action

attribute.description: Indicates the target of submission. Default : _self. Options : _blank,_self,_parent,_top,iframe
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: It indicates the method to be used. Default: post. Options: post, get
attribute.name: method

attribute.description: Indicates the name of form
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: It indicates a validation to be performed on the data form
attribute.name: validation

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: It indicates whether the form should have file support
attribute.name: multipart

tag.example:
<html:form action="#">
<html:form-header label="My title">
</html:form-header>
<html:form-body> <html:form-group label="Field 1" required="true"> <html:input required="true" name="field1"/> </html:form-group> <html:form-group label="Field 2"> <html:input name="field2"/> </html:form-group> <html:form-group-multiple label="Fields group"> <html:input name="fields3[]"/> </html:form-group-multiple> </html:form-body>
<html:form-footer> <html:button state="primary" type="submit" label="Label for submit"/> </html:form-footer> </html:form>

tag.description: Renders a form header on the form component
tag.name: form-header

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Indicates the label of the form
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the localize (i18n) label key of the form
attribute.name: labelKey

tag.description: Renders a form footer on the form component
tag.name: form-footer

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

tag.description: Renders a form body on the form component
tag.name: form-body

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

tag.description: Renders a component grouping in the form
tag.name: form-group

attribute.description: Indicates the label of the group
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (18n) of the group
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the id of the group
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: It indicates the element to be oriented the label
attribute.name: forElement

attribute.description: Indicates whether the completion of the internal component should be mandatory
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be visible
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: Indicates the label component
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n) component
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the collection to be iterated in component
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable java to be made available the object of iteration
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable java (com.jslsolucoes.tagria.tag.html.tag.VarStatus) to be made available the index of iteration.
attribute.name: varStatus

attribute.description: Indicates the minimum number of lines to be filled
attribute.name: atLeast

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should start without lines
attribute.name: empty

attribute.description: Indicates a javascript function to be performed after insert a row. function signature is f(idx,element). idx: index of line was added, element: clone of elements declared in template
attribute.name: afterInsert

attribute.description: Indicates a javascript function to be performed after remove a row. function signature is void f()
attribute.name: afterRemove
